movie_title: Life in the modern office - 6 Minute English
introduction: Most modern offices include large spaces without internal walls dividing them up. The idea is to cre

vocabulary.definition: a system where workers do not have their own permanent desk but use any available desk on a temporary basis
vocabulary.example: In our office, hot-desking has become the norm, so I have to find a new desk every day.

vocabulary.definition: referring to jobs with typical working hours from 9am to 5pm, Monday to Friday
vocabulary.example: I prefer the flexibility of freelancing over the traditional nine-to-five office job.

vocabulary.definition: a piece of work created by putting together different items in interesting combinations
vocabulary.example: She made a beautiful photo montage of her travels to display in her office.

vocabulary.definition: the feeling of knowing something so well that you feel comfortable and relaxed around it
vocabulary.example: The cozy decor in the cafe gave me a sense of familiarity that made me feel at home.

vocabulary.definition: damaged or exhausted due to overuse or age
vocabulary.example: The carpet in the hallway is so worn out that it needs to be replaced.

vocabulary.definition: slang for hard work or strenuous effort
vocabulary.example: His success was a result of years of hard graft and dedication to his craft.
